events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred on the highway, involving a rear-end collision with another vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to involvement of a vehicle collision on a public road.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to guide the policyholder through the claim process and provide assistance.
The claim was officially acknowledged, and the policyholder received confirmation along with next steps for documentation.
Requested documents include the police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and medical bills related to the accident.
The policyholder submitted all required documents including police reports, photos of the damaged car, and medical statements.
An investigation was launched to assess the accident details and validate submitted documents for claim accuracy.
The investigation confirmed liability and validated all documentation supporting the claim for the car accident.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the damages to the vehicle and compensation for medical expenses incurred.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process.
Claim approval was granted after customer acceptance, authorizing release of funds to the insured party.
Payment was issued to the policyholder's bank account to cover repairs and medical expenses as per the settlement.
The claim case was formally closed following the successful payment and resolution of all related matters.
